title: Executive Order 5269-Classification of Jose T. Casanovas
content: Jose T. Casanovas, employed in the Quartermaster Corps of the Army in Porto Rico since 1898, may be given a classified status without regard to the civil service rules.
This order is recommended by the War Department because of Mr. Casanovas's record of long, faithful, and efficient service as janitor and as mason.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5269-Classification of Jose T. Casanovas Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361124
